definition: old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°

sentences.english: Enoch allegedly walked with God who turned him into the archangel Metatron.
sentences.chinese: 以諾依其申述是與神同行，神把他變成了天使長。

sentences.english: The Supreme Court in Quirin did not consider the allegation that one of the accused was a United States citizen.
sentences.chinese: 奎林最高法院未予考慮被告人之一是美國公民的申述。

sentences.english: Cane fields inside decorate reactive back to Tokyo with allegations army.
sentences.chinese: 藤田佈置中村功回東京跟軍部申述。

sentences.english: "I cannot possibly do without Anne, " was Mary's reasoning;
sentences.chinese: “我不能沒有安妮，”瑪麗申述了情由。

sentences.english: It allegedly was a saucer shape interdimensional time travel machine.
sentences.chinese: 依其申述，這是碟形的轉換空間的時間機器。

sentences.english: That is the second time you have made that observation.
sentences.chinese: 那是你第二次作那樣的申述了。

sentences.english: To remove the BH restrictions for the representation sites.
sentences.chinese: 撤銷申述地點的建築物高度限制。

sentences.english: That’s what I offer in Paid to Exist.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我申述的生存所需要付出的代價。

definition: to file a complaint/to appeal (to an authority, a higher court of justice etc)/complaint/appeal
to defend oneself/to rebut a charge
to make a formal request/formal request/to make a claim (law)
to report (an offense to the authorities)/to inform against sb
to re-investigate/to investigate and reconsider a judgment
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue
common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
